author: Ms. Anisha Fernandes
title: Ms. Anisha Fernandes
text: Wish it could be delivered on or before the Valentine's Day as for the extra delivery charges that were borne by me.to make it happen on perfect time. as it was a gift mentioned earlier..thanking you for your revert on the mail that you guys replied...but I bore extra charges for timely delivery...wish if you can compensate for that since it was not on time.
